name: grammar-check
description: An english grammar checker that dynamically highlights mistakes and proposes a correction

excludedScopes.description: List of sub-scopes that will be ignored. Specify the most detailed scope to avoid ignoring otherwise relevant text. The scopes will be parsed as regular expressions. See [the README](https://github.com/atom/spell-check#spell-check-package-) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.
